title: TOWIE's James Argent in rehab in Thailand "to straighten himself out"
text:
TOWIE's James Argent in rehab in Thailand "to straighten himself out" The reality TV star is hoping to beat his demons once and for all Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
James Argent is in rehab in Thailand, we can reveal. 
The 29-year-old - who was admitted to The Priory three years ago for alleged drink and drugs abuse - took the decision to get help over Christmas. 
He has been seeking help for his weight and partying since January - and is believed to be making huge progress. 
A source said: “He’s been very courageous in that he’s actually taken the step himself to seek out help this time, and he’s taken the decision alone. 
“He really struggles with discipline. He struggles to keep his weight down, he gets really tired, then goes partying, drinks a lot and over eats. 
“He gets into this cycle of depression. The reality TV star was formerly known for his indulgent and excessive lifestyle (Photo: MAGICMOMENTSUK) (Photo: Rex Features) 
“He doesn’t want to keep leaning on other people - he wants to sort things out for himself, so he’s getting the best possible help right now.” 
James has been noticeably absent from filming of the current series of TOWIE - with rumours already circulating that he has taken time out to “get stronger.” 
The new series returns on March 5th with some new cast and a longer run. 
Show producers are keeping the door open for him to return when he feels ready. 
He was also absent from the final episodes of the last series, and missed the reality show’s Christmas specials. 
The Essex star was kicked off TOWIE in December 2014 - amid rumours of drug and alcohol abuse. James 'Arg' Argent is currently in the Far East, where he's focusing on his health 
It was claimed bosses had grown tired of his poor timekeeping - and he was suspended for repeatedly not showing up for filming. 
He spent his 27th birthday, and Christmas Day, in December at The Priory - a favourite rehab facility for celebrities. 
He lost a stone and a half during his stint. 
In February 2015, he recalled: “Underneath everything I was badly depressed. I was anxious and tired.” 
He told how he’d stopped answering the door to loved ones and didn’t care anymore. 
He also admitted: “My dad drove me. James Argent 'The Only Way is Essex' cast in Marbella, Spain - 23 Sep 2016 (Photo: Rex Features) 
“It took an hour and a half to get there. I didn’t want my dad to see me cry but as soon as he left I just sober because I knew I had done this to myself.” 
He also blamed depression for ruining his on-off relationship to longterm love Lydia Bright - who is currently starring in Channel 4 series The Jump. 
He split from Lydia last May after she allegedly caught him taking cocaine. 
During TOWIE filming in Marbella last September the pair briefly reunited for a fling.
